title: Number of arrivals in tourist accommodation Slovakia 2006 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of arrivals in millions, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2009.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2014.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2009 to 2006.
gold: This statistic shows the number of tourist arrivals at accommodation establishments in Slovakia from 2006 to 2018 . In 2018 there were around 5.49 million arrivals at accommodation establishments in Slovakia .
